txt.en: The chicken-feed can be found to the south of Frethi, across the street at the supply-house.\n\nFrethi is having issues corralling his chickens and asked if you could collect a bag of feed for them.
Frethi is west of the Mead Hall of Fenmarch.\n\nYou have collected the bag of chicken-feed for Frethi and should bring it to him, so he may feed his chickens.

'These chickens are so unruly! I cannot keep them still. It might be because they are so hungry, but how can I go get the feed if they will not stay still?

'The moment I leave, they will run off...I know it!

'Could you do me a favour and collect a bag of feed from across the road? It would be a great help to me.'
Frethi is distracted with the task of corralling his chickens.

'Well, you did not take long. I was not even able to corral these chickens in the time it took you. Hopefully, this feed will satisfy them.\n\n'If you would accept chicken-feed, I could repay you in that; otherwise, I do not have much to offer aside from my gratitude.'
